verses.verse: Again the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of your people, <S%H5971><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to them, When <S%H3588><s%> I bring <S%H935><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%> on a land, <S%H776><s%> if the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> of their coasts, <S%H7097><s%> and set <S%H5414><s%> him for their watchman: <S%H6822><s%>
If when he sees <S%H7200><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%> come <S%H935><s%> on the land, <S%H776><s%> he blow <S%H8628><s%> the trumpet, <S%H7782><s%> and warn <S%H2094><s%> the people; <S%H5971><s%>

Then whoever hears <S%H8085><s%> the sound <S%H6963><s%> of the trumpet, <S%H7782><s%> and takes not warning; <S%H2094><s%> if the sword <S%H2719><s%> come, <S%H935><s%> and take <S%H3947><s%> him away, his blood <S%H1818><s%> shall be on his own head. <S%H7218><s%>

He heard <S%H8085><s%> the sound <S%H6963><s%> of the trumpet, <S%H7782><s%> and took not warning; <S%H2094><s%> his blood <S%H1818><s%> shall be on him. But he that takes warning <S%H2094><s%> shall deliver <S%H4422><s%> his soul. <S%H5315><s%>

But if <S%H3588><s%> the watchman <S%H6822><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%> come, <S%H935><s%> and blow <S%H8628><s%> not the trumpet, <S%H7782><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> be not warned; <S%H2094><s%> if the sword <S%H2719><s%> come, <S%H935><s%> and take <S%H3947><s%> any person <S%H5315><s%> from among them, he is taken <S%H3947><s%> away in his iniquity; <S%H5771><s%> but his blood <S%H1818><s%> will I require <S%H1875><s%> at the watchman's <S%H6822><s%> hand. <S%H3027><s%>

So you, O son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> I have set <S%H5414><s%> you a watchman <S%H6822><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> therefore you shall hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> at my mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and warn <S%H2094><s%> them from me.

When I say <S%H559><s%> to the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> O wicked <S%H7563><s%> man, you shall surely die; <S%H4191><s%> if you do not speak <S%H1696><s%> to warn <S%H2094><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%> from his way, <S%H1870><s%> that wicked <S%H7563><s%> man shall die <S%H4191><s%> in his iniquity; <S%H5771><s%> but his blood <S%H1818><s%> will I require <S%H1245><s%> at your hand. <S%H3027><s%>

Nevertheless, if <S%H3588><s%> you warn <S%H2094><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%> of his way <S%H1870><s%> to turn <S%H7725><s%> from it; if he do not turn <S%H7725><s%> from his way, <S%H1870><s%> he shall die <S%H4191><s%> in his iniquity; <S%H5771><s%> but you have delivered <S%H5337><s%> your soul. <S%H5315><s%>

Therefore, O you son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> speak <S%H559><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> Thus <S%H3651><s%> you speak, <S%H559><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> If <S%H3588><s%> our transgressions <S%H6588><s%> and our sins <S%H2403><s%> be on us, and we pine <S%H4743><s%> away in them, how <S%H349><s%> should we then live? <S%H2421><s%>

Say <S%H559><s%> to them, As I live, <S%H2416><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD, <S%H3069><s%> I have no <S%H518><s%> pleasure <S%H2654><s%> in the death <S%H4194><s%> of the wicked; <S%H7563><s%> but that the wicked <S%H7563><s%> turn <S%H7725><s%> from his way <S%H1870><s%> and live: <S%H2421><s%> turn <S%H7725><s%> you, turn <S%H7725><s%> you from your evil <S%H7451><s%> ways; <S%H1870><s%> for why <S%H4100><s%> will you die, <S%H4191><s%> O house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel? <S%H3478><s%>

Therefore, you son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> say <S%H559><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of your people, <S%H5971><s%> The righteousness <S%H6666><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall not deliver <S%H5337><s%> him in the day <S%H3117><s%> of his transgression: <S%H6588><s%> as for the wickedness <S%H7564><s%> of the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> he shall not fall <S%H3782><s%> thereby in the day <S%H3117><s%> that he turns <S%H7725><s%> from his wickedness; <S%H7562><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall the righteous <S%H6662><s%> be able <S%H3201><s%> to live <S%H2421><s%> for his righteousness in the day <S%H3117><s%> that he sins. <S%H2398><s%>

When I shall say <S%H559><s%> to the righteous, <S%H6662><s%> that he shall surely live; <S%H2421><s%> if he trust <S%H982><s%> to his own righteousness, <S%H6666><s%> and commit <S%H6213><s%> iniquity, <S%H5766><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his righteousnesses <S%H6666><s%> shall not be remembered; <S%H2142><s%> but for his iniquity <S%H5766><s%> that he has committed, <S%H6213><s%> he shall die <S%H4191><s%> for it.

Again, when I say <S%H559><s%> to the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> You shall surely die; <S%H4191><s%> if he turn <S%H7725><s%> from his sin, <S%H2403><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> that which is lawful <S%H4941><s%> and right; <S%H6666><s%>

If the wicked <S%H7563><s%> restore <S%H7725><s%> the pledge, <S%H2258><s%> give <S%H7999><s%> again <S%H7999><s%> that he had robbed, <S%H1500><s%> walk <S%H1980><s%> in the statutes <S%H2708><s%> of life, <S%H2416><s%> without <S%H1115><s%> committing <S%H6213><s%> iniquity; <S%H5766><s%> he shall surely live, <S%H2421><s%> he shall not die. <S%H4191><s%>

None <S%H3808><s%> of his sins <S%H2403><s%> that he has committed <S%H2398><s%> shall be mentioned <S%H2142><s%> to him: he has done <S%H6213><s%> that which is lawful <S%H4941><s%> and right; <S%H6666><s%> he shall surely live. <S%H2421><s%>

Yet the children <S%H1121><s%> of your people <S%H5971><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> The way <S%H1870><s%> of the Lord <S%H136><s%> is not equal: <S%H8505><s%> but as for them, their way <S%H1870><s%> is not equal. <S%H8505><s%>
When the righteous <S%H6662><s%> turns <S%H7725><s%> from his righteousness, <S%H6666><s%> and commits <S%H6213><s%> iniquity, <S%H5766><s%> he shall even die <S%H4191><s%> thereby.

But if the wicked <S%H7563><s%> turn <S%H7725><s%> from his wickedness, <S%H7564><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> that which is lawful <S%H4941><s%> and right, <S%H6666><s%> he shall live <S%H2421><s%> thereby.

Yet you say, <S%H559><s%> The way <S%H1870><s%> of the Lord <S%H136><s%> is not equal. <S%H8505><s%> O you house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> I will judge <S%H8199><s%> you every <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> after his ways. <S%H1870><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass in the twelfth <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of our captivity, <S%H1546><s%> in the tenth <S%H6224><s%> month, in the fifth <S%H2568><s%> day of the month, <S%H2320><s%> that one that had escaped <S%H6412><s%> out of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to me, saying, <S%H559><s%> The city <S%H5892><s%> is smitten. <S%H5221><s%>

Now the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was on me in the evening, <S%H6153><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> he that was escaped <S%H6412><s%> came; <S%H935><s%> and had opened <S%H6605><s%> my mouth, <S%H6310><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> he came <S%H935><s%> to me in the morning; <S%H1242><s%> and my mouth <S%H6310><s%> was opened, <S%H6605><s%> and I was no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> dumb. <S%H481><s%>
Then the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> they that inhabit <S%H3427><s%> those <S%H428><s%> wastes <S%H2723><s%> of the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> speak, <S%H559><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%> was one, <S%H259><s%> and he inherited <S%H3423><s%> the land: <S%H776><s%> but we are many; <S%H7227><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> is given <S%H5414><s%> us for inheritance. <S%H4181><s%>

Why <S%H3651><s%> say <S%H559><s%> to them, Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> You eat <S%H398><s%> with the blood, <S%H1818><s%> and lift <S%H5375><s%> up your eyes <S%H5869><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> your idols, <S%H1544><s%> and shed <S%H8210><s%> blood: <S%H1818><s%> and shall you possess <S%H3423><s%> the land? <S%H776><s%>

You stand <S%H5975><s%> on your sword, <S%H2719><s%> you work <S%H6213><s%> abomination, <S%H8441><s%> and you defile <S%H2930><s%> every <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> his neighbor's <S%H7453><s%> wife: <S%H802><s%> and shall you possess <S%H3423><s%> the land? <S%H776><s%>

Say <S%H559><s%> you thus <S%H3541><s%> to them, Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> As I live, <S%H2416><s%> surely <S%H518><s%> <S%H3808><s%> they that are in the wastes <S%H2723><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> by the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and him that is in the open <S%H6440><s%> field <S%H7704><s%> will I give <S%H5414><s%> to the beasts <S%H2416><s%> to be devoured, <S%H398><s%> and they that be in the forts <S%H4679><s%> and in the caves <S%H4631><s%> shall die <S%H4191><s%> of the pestilence. <S%H1698><s%>

For I will lay <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> most desolate, <S%H8077><s%> and the pomp <S%H1347><s%> of her strength <S%H5797><s%> shall cease; <S%H7673><s%> and the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall be desolate, <S%H8074><s%> that none <S%H369><s%> shall pass <S%H5674><s%> through.

Then shall they know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> when I have laid <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> most desolate <S%H8077><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> their abominations <S%H8441><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they have committed. <S%H6213><s%>

Also, you son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of your people <S%H5971><s%> still are talking <S%H1696><s%> against you by the walls <S%H7023><s%> and in the doors <S%H6607><s%> of the houses, <S%H1004><s%> and speak <S%H1696><s%> one <S%H2297><s%> to another, <S%H259><s%> every <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> to his brother, <S%H251><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Come, <S%H935><s%> I pray <S%H4994><s%> you, and hear <S%H8085><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> is the word <S%H1697><s%> that comes <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> from the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And they come <S%H935><s%> to you as the people <S%H5971><s%> comes, <S%H935><s%> and they sit <S%H3427><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you as my people, <S%H5971><s%> and they hear <S%H8085><s%> your words, <S%H1697><s%> but they will not do <S%H6213><s%> them: for with their mouth <S%H6310><s%> they show <S%H6213><s%> much love, <S%H5690><s%> but their heart <S%H3820><s%> goes <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H310><s%> their covetousness. <S%H1215><s%>

And, see, <S%H2009><s%> you are to them as a very <S%H5690><s%> lovely <S%H5690><s%> song <S%H7892><s%> of one that has a pleasant <S%H3303><s%> voice, <S%H6963><s%> and can play <S%H5059><s%> well on an instrument: for they hear <S%H8085><s%> your words, <S%H1697><s%> but they do <S%H6213><s%> them not.

And when this comes <S%H935><s%> to pass, (see, <S%H2009><s%> it will come, <S%H935><s%>) then shall they know <S%H3045><s%> that a prophet <S%H5030><s%> has been <S%H1961><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them.
